```{r}
dir.create(snakemake@params[["fig_folder"]],
    recursive = TRUE, showWarnings = FALSE)
```

```{r}
sample_info <- read_csv(snakemake@input[["sample_info"]]) %>% 
    filter(!is.na(ont)) %>%
    mutate_at(vars(matches("condition")), as.factor) %>% 
    dplyr::select(sample_id, illumina, ont, cdna) %>% 
    tidyr::gather("method", "barcode", -sample_id) %>% 
    dplyr::select(-method)
```

```{r }
get_map_type <- function(flag) {
    if_else(flag == 4, "unmapped",
        if_else(flag %in% c(0, 16), "primary",
            if_else(flag %in% c(256, 275), "secondary", "supplementary")))
}
```

```{r dataImport_tx_bam}
df_tx <- c(snakemake@input[["teloprime_bam_tx"]], snakemake@input[["cdna_bam_tx"]]) %>%
    set_names(basename(snakemake@input[["teloprime_bam_tx"]]), basename(snakemake@input[["cdna_bam_tx"]])) %>% 
    map(read_rds) %>%     
    map(mutate, type = get_map_type(flag)) %>% 
    map(dplyr::select, -flag) %>% 
    map(tidyr::separate, col = seqnames,
        into = c("ensembl_transcript_id_version", "ensembl_gene_id_version"),
        sep = '\\|', extra = "drop") %>% 
    bind_rows(.id = "sample") %>% 
    tidyr::separate(sample, c("library", "barcode"), extra = "drop")
```

```{r}
mapping_df_tx <- df_tx %>% 
    dplyr::select(library, qname, type) %>% 
    group_by(library, qname) %>% 
    summarise(has_primary = any(type == "primary"),
        has_supplementary = any(type == "supplementary")) %>% 
    ungroup()
```


## Length of primary and supplementary reads

Based on the mapping against the transcriptome. From bam files.

```{r}
df_tx %>% 
    dplyr::select(-barcode) %>% 
    left_join(mapping_df_tx %>% dplyr::select(-library), by = "qname") %>% 
    mutate(category = if_else(type == "supplementary", "supplementary",
        if_else(has_supplementary, "primary_with_supplementary", "primary_wo_supplementary"))) %>% 
    ggplot(aes(category, qwidth)) + 
    geom_violin(aes(fill = library)) +
    scale_y_log10() +
    scale_fill_colorblind() +
    theme_tufte() +
    geom_rangeframe(sides = "l") +
    xlab(NULL) + 
    ylab("Read length")
```

```{r}
df_tx %>% 
    dplyr::select(-sample, -flag) %>% 
    left_join(mapping_df_tx %>% dplyr::select(-library), by = "qname") %>% 
    mutate(category = if_else(type == "supplementary", "supplementary",
        if_else(has_supplementary, "primary_with_supplementary", "primary_wo_supplementary"))) %>% 
    ggplot(aes(category, aligned)) + 
    geom_violin(aes(fill = library)) +
    scale_y_log10() +
    scale_fill_colorblind() +
    theme_tufte() +
    geom_rangeframe(sides = "l") +
    xlab(NULL) + 
    ylab("Aligned read length")
```


```{r dataImport_genome}
mapping_df_genome <- c(snakemake@input[["teloprime_bam_genome"]], snakemake@input[["cdna_bam_genome"]]) %>%
    set_names(basename(snakemake@input[["teloprime_bam_genome"]]), basename(snakemake@input[["cdna_bam_genome"]])) %>% 
    map(read_rds) %>%     
    map(mutate, type = get_map_type(flag)) %>% 
    map(dplyr::select, -seqnames, -flag) %>% 
    bind_rows(.id = "sample") %>% 
    dplyr::select(library, qname, type) %>% 
    group_by(library, qname) %>% 
    summarise(has_primary = any(type == "primary"),
        has_supplementary = any(type == "supplementary"))
```


```{r}
mapping_df2 <- mapping_df_tx %>% 
    left_join(mapping_df_genome, by = "qname", suffix = c("_tx", "_genome")) %>% 
    group_by(library) %>% 
    summarise(n_primary_genome = sum(has_primary_genome, na.rm = TRUE),
        n_supplementary_genome = sum(has_supplementary_genome, na.rm = TRUE),
        n_primary_transcriptome = sum(has_primary_tx, na.rm = TRUE),
        n_supplementary_transcriptome = sum(has_supplementary_tx, na.rm = TRUE)) %>% 
        tidyr::gather("type", "count", -library)

# The unmapped reads are not in he input files because genomicAlignments cannot
# handle them. They have to be entered from somewhere else
#mapping_df2 %>% 
#    group_by(library) %>% 
#    mutate(p = count/count[type == "n_total"]) %>% 
#    ungroup()

mapping_df2 %>% 
    knitr::kable(format = "html") %>%
    kableExtra::kable_styling()

mapping_df2 %>% 
    mutate(type = factor(type, 
        levels = c("n_primary_genome", "n_supplementary_genome",
            "n_primary_transcriptome", "n_supplementary_transcriptome"))) %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x = method, y = count,  fill = type)) +
    geom_bar(stat = "identity", position=position_dodge()) +
    scale_y_continuous(labels = function(x) x / 10^6) +
    theme_tufte() +
    facet_wrap(~library) +
    geom_rangeframe(sides = "l") +
    xlab(NULL) + 
    ylab("Mio. Reads") +
    scale_fill_colorblind()
```

# Transcriptome

## Aligned length vs read length

Primary hits only

```{r plotTranscriptome}
df_tx %>% 
    filter(type == "primary") %>% 
    ggplot(aes(qwidth, aligned)) +
    geom_hex(aes(fill = ..density..), binwidth = .025) +
    facet_grid(~library) +
    scale_x_log10() +
    scale_y_log10() +
    scale_fill_viridis_c(trans = "log") +
    geom_abline(slope = 1) +
    theme_tufte() +
    geom_rangeframe(sides = "bl") +
    xlab("Read Length") + 
    ylab("Aligned Length")
```

## Aligned length vs expected length

```{r import_txdb}
biomart <- snakemake@input[["biomaRt_tx"]] %>% 
    read_rds()
```

```{r}
df_tx %>% 
    filter(type == "primary") %>% 
    dplyr::select(ensembl_transcript_id_version, aligned) %>% 
    left_join(biomart, by = "ensembl_transcript_id_version") %>%

    scale_y_log10() +
    scale_fill_viridis_c(trans = "log") +
    geom_abline(slope = 1) +
    theme_tufte() +
    geom_rangeframe(sides = "bl") +
    xlab("Transcript length") + 
    ylab("Aligned length")
```
